data.title: Deb Stover Book & Series List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Deb Stover's books & series in order (18 books) (1 series). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
Shades of Rose

Jun-1995

/ Paranormal Romance

Deb Stover has more energy than anyone I know. She's a prolific and excellent writer, a whiz at computers, has won a heap of awards for her work...and all before she sold her first book! Given Deb's ability and drive, I think that book--Shades of Ros...

A Willing Spirit

Oct-1996

/ Paranormal Romance

Winnie Sinclair can't explain how she ended up in an Oklahoma thunderstorm making wild love to Paul Weathers, her ex-husband's divorce attorney, a.k.a "The Barracuda Lawyer". And she certainly can't explain how that same storm swept her back to 1896 ...

Some Like It Hotter

Apr-1997

/ Paranormal Romance

Abigail Kingsley can't believe it! Hasn't she been through enough deprivation and heartache in the wake of the Civil War? Now a big, handsome Yankee has appeared uninvited in her great hall, insisting he's from the future.... For Natchez detectiv...

Almost An Angel

Nov-1997

/ Paranormal Romance

Heaven Can Wait The right man had finally come along for Hilary Brown. It was about time, too --- she had waited a hundred and eleven years! In fact, Hilary had actually died in the mining town of Columbine, Colorado over a century before. She was...

Another Dawn

Jan-1999

/ Paranormal Romance

A WOMAN LOST IN TIME... When she awoke from the horrendous explosion her memory was gone. The bracelet she wore said "Sofie," and the young priest who pulled her from the wreckage was insisting she was a doctor. But how did she get there? And ho...

Stolen Wishes

Oct-1999

/ Historical Romance

A Beautiful Woman Lost In A Timeless Tale Mary Goode was a mere thirteen when she rescued her young brother, Robin, and two of his friends from a cruel asylum and escaped with them to the Oklahoma wood. It is there that the four made their simple ho...

A Matter of Trust

Feb-2000

/ Contemporary Romance

THERE ARE SOME WOUNDS TIME DOESN'T HEAL... Returning to her tiny hometown of Digby, Colorado to begin her medical career, young Dr. Taylor Bowen is shocked to discover the half-naked and utterly gorgeous body of her first patient belongs to a man s...

A Moment in Time

Jun-2000

/ Paranormal Romance

Destiny Swept Her Back in Time... After a romantic mountain getaway ends in disaster, Jackie Clarke finds herself hiking back to civilization alone. But a wrong turn soon lands her in an abandoned ghost town, where in one moment she's staring ...

No Place for a Lady

Nov-2001

/ Historical Romance

The Wild West Was No Place For A Lady... Irish maid Molly Riordan never thought she would thank her lucky stars when her mistress indulged in one night's indiscretion with a masked American at a costume ball. But now Lady Elizabeth Summersby h...

Mulligan Stew

May-2002

/ Contemporary Romance

A WOMAN Single mother Bridget Mulligan is on the verge of homelessness when her late husband's family invites her and her son to Ireland. Irish in-laws sound like more trouble than Grandpa's coonhound when the neighbor's poodle goes into heat, but B...

Citizen Daisy

Sep-2002

/ Paranormal Romance

A moaning wind. A yellow moon. A black cat twining 'round your legs. No night is more bewitched than Halloween, when the mists of time shimmer and the doorways between worlds open. Gathered together in this captivating anthology are three haunting st...

Mulligan Magic

Apr-2003

/ Romantic Suspense

In this enchanting follow-up to Mulligan Stew, award-winning author Deb Stover returns to the sprawling modern Irish countryside, where just a dash of magic on an ancient isle can spark the fiery depths of love and passion... Maggie Mulligan is th...

Skin Deep

in Irresistible Forces

Feb-2004

/ Paranormal Romance

Hearts collide and desire consumes in worlds and ages far from our own.... Six of today's most popular authors join talents in this unique anthology that shows love can conquer all...even the boundaries of time and space. These stories--many featu...

The Gift

Nov-2009

/ Romantic Suspense

Blood. Rivers of it. The visions are overwhelming. They come every time Beth visits the scene of a murder. She lives the victim's last moments, feels the pain, sees the perp. And it's driving her mad. A flat tire. A deserted country road. A man t...

Maid Marian and the Lawman

Dec-2013

/ Historical Romance

Sometimes the simple goodness of a dream reminds us how to fall in love. 1896 Oklahoma Indian Territory Mary Goode has spent nearly a decade hiding her sweetly off-kilter brother, Robin, and two fellow misfits after she rescued them from a brutal...

Time's Embrace

Jun-2014

/ Romance

Three novels in one collector's edition volume! Three of best selling author Deb Stover's most-loved time travel romance novels are collected here for the first time in Time's Embrace. These classic romance stories are a tour de force adventure throu...

The Bargain

Sep-2014

/ Romance

A man out of time. A woman out of options. Natchez detective Mike Faricy will do anything to undo his brother-in-law's murder. A man named Slick offers him a deal he can't refuse -- go back to June 19th, the day before the killing. Mike strikes the B...
